title.rendered: Prishtina REA, in cooperation with The Chamber of Hospitality and Tourism of Kosovo, is organizing a Tailored Workshop on Single Market Programme Opportunities for the Tourism Sector!

content.rendered:
Prishtina REA, in cooperation with 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐇𝐨𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐦 𝐨𝐟 𝐊𝐨𝐬𝐨𝐯𝐨, is organizing a Tailored Workshop on 𝐒𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐦𝐞 𝐎𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐓𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐦 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫!

 Date: 25 January 2025
 Time: 10:00-12:00
 Venue: Hotel Garden, Prishtinë

Why Attend?


 Enhance your knowledge of the Single Market Programme.
 Discover opportunities for grants and SME development in the tourism sector.
 Gain valuable insights to strengthen your business strategies.!

Agenda Highlights:

  • 10:00 - 11:00 "𝑈𝑛𝑑𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑡𝑎𝑛𝑑𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑆𝑖𝑛𝑔𝑙𝑒 𝑀𝑎𝑟𝑘𝑒𝑡 𝑃𝑟𝑜𝑔𝑟𝑎𝑚 𝑀𝑜𝑑𝑒𝑙 𝑓𝑜𝑟 𝑆𝑀𝐸 𝐼𝑛𝑛𝑜𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝐺𝑟𝑜𝑤𝑡ℎ."
  • 11:00 - 11:30 "S𝑆𝑡𝑟𝑎𝑡𝑒𝑔𝑖𝑒𝑠 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑇𝑜𝑜𝑙𝑠 𝑡𝑜 𝐵𝑜𝑜𝑠𝑡 𝑇𝑜𝑢𝑟𝑖𝑠𝑚 𝑆𝑀𝐸𝑠: 𝐼𝑛𝑠𝑖𝑔ℎ𝑡𝑠 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 𝑃𝑟𝑖𝑠ℎ𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑎 𝑅𝐸𝐴."
  • 11:30 - 12:00 𝐼𝑛𝑡𝑒𝑟𝑎𝑐𝑡𝑖𝑣𝑒 𝑄&𝐴 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑁𝑒𝑡𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑘𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑆𝑒𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛.

 Limited spots available – Max 15 participants.
Don’t miss this opportunity to elevate your tourism business and explore new possibilities within the Single Market Programme!
